description.value:
You take a moment to center yourself, then unleash a powerful blow that sends your target tumbling away.

Make an unarmed Strike. If you hit, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or be pushed up to 10 feet directly away from you (or 20 feet, on a critical failure) and fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}.

If another creature or physical object would prevent this movement, both your target and the blocking creature or object take [[/r 1d6[bludgeoning]]] damage per 5 feet of movement that was prevented.
